title: Coronado National Memorial: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       New! Visitor center exhibits installed The visitor center has re-opened with the installation of new exhibits and museum pieces. Be sure to visit us and see the brand new exhibits about the Coronado expedition, the legacy of Spanish and Native American cultures in the region, and the natural history of Coronado National Memorial.                    Learn about Coronado at the Visitor Center               Keep an eye out for the elusive Coatimundi               Explore the oak woodlands of Montezuma Canyon             Planning For...        NPS Photo/Dave Bly  How to get here            NPS Photo/Dave Bly    Coronado Cave         NPS photo  Things To Do            NPS Photo  Free Ranger-led Programs        NPS Photo  Safety
